title: Transition-metal-catalyzed enantioselective C–N cross-coupling
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,9560-9581
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00102H, Review Article
Jia Feng, Long-Long Xi, Chuan-Jun Lu, Ren-Rong Liu
Enantioselective C–N coupling is considered one of the most efficient protocols for chiral amine synthesis. This review summarizes the established protocols and offers an outlook on the enantioselective C–N cross-coupling reaction.
